subject: Swimming
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: A 9-year-old who sat in front of the television watching Mark Spitz in the Munich Games chronicled the quest of Michael Phelps in the 2008 Olympics.
snippet: A 9-year-old who sat in front of the television watching Mark Spitz in the Munich Games chronicled the quest of Michael Phelps in the 2008 Olympics.
